meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Nixon Stuart Nulman Russ Harris Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1346.

td.p: David Nixon, a personnel supervisor from San Antonio, Texas
Stuart Nulman, a newspaper editor and columnist from Saint-Laurent, Montreal
Russ Harris, a writer originally from Lincoln, Nebraska (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,300)

tr.td: "P"s & "Q"s
FAIRY TALES
JAPAN
FOOD
COWBOYS
INDIANS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Russ: Who is Marie Cassatt?)
...
(Alex: I had to penalize you there, Russ, because, as you know, on Jeopardy!, if you give me the last name, that\'s sufficient during the regular play of the game, but if you add a first name and the first name is incorrect, then we have to rule against you. Her name is [*], not Marie.)

Mary Cassatt

Russ
Triple Stumper
')

$10,900
South Africa & USSR')
